faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our subscription plans
faq.contactSupport: Our support team is here to assist you with any additional questions
faq.canChangePlan: Can I change my plan later?
faq.changePlanAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle. Upgrades are prorated, while downgrades take effect after your current billing period ends.
faq.commitmentAnswer: No, all plans are month-to-month with no long-term commitment. Cancel anytime without fees. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
faq.devicesSimultaneously: How many devices can I use simultaneously?
faq.devicesAnswer: The number of simultaneous streams varies by plan. Please check the specific device limits for each plan in our comparison table to find the one that best suits your household's needs.
faq.discountsAvailable: Do you offer student, military, or loyalty discounts?
faq.discountsAnswer: While we currently don't support loyalty or special discounts, we're actively working on implementing a comprehensive loyalty program. Stay tuned for future updates as we continue to enhance our subscription offerings.
faq.paymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentAnswer: We accept mobile money (MTN, Airtel), credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard), and bank transfers. All payments are secure and encrypted for your protection.
faq.offlineViewing: Can I download content for offline viewing?
faq.offlineAnswer: Offline download availability depends on your selected plan. Please review the feature comparison between plans to see which ones include download capabilities and their respective limits.
faq.regionalAvailability: Is content available in all regions?
faq.regionalAnswer: Due to licensing agreements, some content may not be available in all regions. Our catalog is optimized for East African audiences with a rich mix of local and international content.
faq.cancelSubscription: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.cancelAnswer: You can cancel anytime from your account settings. Navigate to 'Subscription' ‚Üí 'Manage Plan' ‚Üí 'Cancel Subscription'. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.
faq.videoQuality: What video quality can I expect?
faq.qualityAnswer: Video quality varies by subscription plan, ranging from standard definition to 4K Ultra HD. Please refer to the plan comparison for specific quality offerings that match each tier.
faq.billingCycle: When does my billing cycle start?
faq.billingAnswer: Your billing cycle starts immediately upon subscription and renews automatically every 30 days. You'll receive a notification before each renewal, and you can cancel at any time without penalty.

features.ctaDescription: Join now and experience premium entertainment tailored for you.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Oliviuus and your streaming experience
faq.ctaDescription: Join Oliviuus today and experience premium entertainment
faq.contactDescription: Our dedicated support team is here to help you with any questions or issues.
faq.sendMessageDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

difference.question: What makes Oliviuus different from other streaming platforms?
difference.answer: Oliviuus uniquely combines global premium content with exclusive Rwandan cinema, creating a platform that celebrates African storytelling while offering international entertainment. We're dedicated to elevating Rwandan filmmakers and bringing their stories to a global audience.

cost.question: How much does Oliviuus cost?
cost.answer: Oliviuus offers flexible plans starting from RWF 3,000 to RWF 10,000 monthly. Each plan provides excellent value with features tailored to different viewing needs - from basic streaming to premium 4K quality and multiple simultaneous streams.

multipleDevices.question: Can I watch Oliviuus on multiple devices?
multipleDevices.answer: Yes! Stream on your smartphone, tablet, laptop, Smart TV, and gaming consoles simultaneously. The number of devices depends on your chosen plan, with options perfect for individuals, couples, or entire families.

rwandanContent.question: What type of Rwandan content is available?
rwandanContent.answer: We feature a rich collection of Rwandan movies, documentaries, series, and original productions. From acclaimed cinematic works to emerging local talent, we're building the largest platform dedicated to Rwandan storytelling and cultural expression.

changeSubscription.question: How do I change or upgrade my subscription plan?
changeSubscription.answer: You can easily upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime from your account settings. Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated billing, while downgrades apply at the start of your next billing cycle.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept in Rwanda?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major payment methods including mobile money (MTN, Airtel), credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard), and bank transfers. All transactions are secure and encrypted for your protection.

downloadOffline.question: Can I download movies and shows to watch offline?
downloadOffline.answer: Yes! Download your favorite content to watch without internet connection. Availability and download limits vary by subscription plan - perfect for travel or areas with limited connectivity.

outsideRwanda.question: Is Oliviuus available outside Rwanda?
outsideRwanda.answer: Currently, Oliviuus is optimized for Rwandan audiences with plans to expand across East Africa. Some content may have regional restrictions due to licensing agreements, but our Rwandan content library is available everywhere.

videoQuality.question: What video quality can I expect?
videoQuality.answer: Video quality ranges from standard definition to stunning 4K Ultra HD, depending on your subscription plan and device capability. Higher-tier plans offer the best visual experience with HDR support.

supportFilmmakers.question: How does Oliviuus support Rwandan filmmakers?
supportFilmmakers.answer: We partner directly with Rwandan production houses, provide better distribution channels, offer funding opportunities, and ensure fair compensation. Our platform is designed to elevate local talent and bring Rwandan stories to global audiences.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.welcome: Welcome to Oliviuus, a streaming platform dedicated to delivering entertainment to audiences in Rwanda and beyond. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the Oliviuus platform, including our website, mobile apps, streaming services, and all related features (collectively, the "Service").
termsOfService.agreementNotice: By creating an account, subscribing, or using the Service, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, you may not use Oliviuus.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
points: You must be at least 13 years old.
If under 18, you must have parental or guardian consent to use the Service.
You must provide accurate account information.
We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these requirements.

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration
points1: You must provide accurate and complete information.
You are responsible for keeping your login details secure.
You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized activity.
points2: Create multiple accounts to abuse free trials.
Share your password with others outside your household.
Use or access somebody else's account without permission.

freeTrial.title: Free Trial
freeTrial.description: Oliviuus may offer a one-time free trial per user and payment method.
points: You may cancel anytime before the trial ends to avoid charges.
freeTrial.warning: Attempting to exploit or bypass the free-trial system is prohibited.

subscriptionsPayments.title: Subscriptions & Payments
points: You authorize Oliviuus to charge your selected payment method (e.g., Mobile Money, card).
Subscription fees are billed monthly unless otherwise specified.
All payments are non-refundable unless required by law.
We may change pricing, but will notify you in advance.

contentUsageRules.title: Content & Usage Rules
contentUsageRules.description: Oliviuus grants you a limited, non-transferable, non-exclusive license to access our content for personal, non-commercial use.
points: Download, copy, screen-record, or redistribute content without permission.
Use the Service for public screenings without authorization.
Use bots, scripts, or automated tools to access the Service.
contentUsageRules.deviceLimit: We may limit the number of devices that can stream simultaneously.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All Oliviuus content (movies, series, UI design, brand assets, logos, software) is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
points: Use the Oliviuus brand name without written approval.

thirdPartyIntegrations.title: Third-Party Integrations
thirdPartyIntegrations.description: Oliviuus may work with third-party partners (analytics, payment processors, cloud hosting).

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may suspend or terminate your account if:
points: Engage in illegal or harmful activities,
Abuse the Service or payment system.
termination.userRight: You may also delete your account at any time.

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.description: We strive to provide uninterrupted service, but:
points: Downtime, maintenance, or errors may occur.
Certain content may be added or removed without notice.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Oliviuus is provided "as is" and "as available."
points: That the Service will meet your expectations,
That there will be no interruptions or errors,
That all content will always remain available.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
points: Oliviuus is not liable for indirect, incidental, or special damages.
Our total liability will not exceed the amount you paid for the Service in the last 3 months.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to These Terms
changesToTerms.description: We may update these Terms from time to time.
changesToTerms.continuation: Continued use of Oliviuus after updates means you accept the revised Terms.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.description: If you have questions about these Terms:

termsOfService.footer: These Terms of Service are effective as of {{date}}. By using Oliviuus, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms.

seo.title: Oliviuus Terms of Service | Streaming Platform Rules & Policies
seo.description: Read Oliviuus Terms of Service. Learn about our streaming platform rules, subscription policies, content usage guidelines, and user agreements for Rwanda and international viewers.
seo.keywords: Oliviuus terms of service, streaming platform rules, subscription policies, content usage guidelines, user agreement, Rwanda streaming service, entertainment platform terms

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Oliviuus ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

informationYouProvide.title: A. Information you provide
informationYouProvide.note: We do not store your full payment credentials‚Äîonly necessary transaction data.

howWeUseYourInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseYourInformation.importantNote: We never sell your personal data.

legalRequirements.title: B. Legal requirements
legalRequirements.note: We will only share what is legally necessary.

dataStorageSecurity.title: Data Storage & Security
dataStorageSecurity.recommendation: We encourage you to use a strong password.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
points: Request a copy of your data

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
points: Account data until you delete your account,
Transaction data as required by law,

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.description1: Oliviuus does not knowingly collect data from children under 13.
childrensPrivacy.description2: If you believe a child has provided data, contact us to remove it.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.description: We may update this Policy from time to time.
changesToPolicy.notification: We will notify you of major changes.

footer.consent: By using Oliviuus, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you have any concerns about your privacy, please contact us.
footer.effectiveDate: This Privacy Policy is effective as of {{date}}.

seo.title: Oliviuus Privacy Policy | Data Protection & User Privacy
seo.description: Read Oliviuus Privacy Policy. Learn how we protect your data, what information we collect, how we use it, and your privacy rights on our streaming platform.
seo.keywords: Oliviuus privacy policy, data protection, user privacy, streaming platform data collection, GDPR compliance, Rwanda data privacy, personal information security

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: Find answers to common questions or get personalized support from our team

search.placeholder: What do you need help with? Type your question...

noResults.title: No exact matches found for "{{query}}"
noResults.description: Try using different keywords or browse our help categories below

results.title: Search Results
results.defaultAnswer: Please refer to the specific help category for detailed information about this topic.

questions.question: How to create an account
questions.answer: Click the 'Sign In' button on our homepage. Enter your email, create a secure password, and complete the verification process. You'll receive a confirmation email to activate your Oliviuus account.

questions.question: How to reset your password
questions.answer: Navigate to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Enter your registered email address, and we'll send you a secure password reset link. For security reasons, the link expires after 24 hours.

questions.question: How to verify your email
questions.answer: Check your email inbox for a verification message from Oliviuus. Click the verification link to confirm your account. If you don't see the email, please check your spam or junk folder.

questions.question: How to change your account details
questions.answer: Access your profile menu and select 'Account Settings'. From there, you can update your personal information, email address, password, and communication preferences securely.

questions.question: Accepted payment methods
questions.answer: Oliviuus accepts Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), Visa, MasterCard, and local Rwandan payment methods. All transactions are processed through secure, encrypted payment gateways for your protection.

questions.question: How promotional trials work
questions.answer: Oliviuus occasionally offers promotional trial periods during special events or campaigns. These trials are announced on our website and social media channels. Regular subscription plans are billed monthly with transparent pricing.

questions.question: How to update your payment method
questions.answer: In your account settings, navigate to 'Billing & Payments'. Click 'Update Payment Method' to securely enter new payment details. Your subscription will continue uninterrupted with the updated payment information.

questions.question: How to cancel or resume your subscription
questions.answer: To cancel: Go to 'Subscription Management' in your account settings and select 'Cancel Subscription'. To resume: Visit the subscription page and choose 'Reactivate Subscription'. Changes take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

questions.question: Supported devices & platforms
questions.answer: Stream on: Web browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge), iOS/Android mobile apps, Smart TVs (Android TV, Samsung Tizen), gaming consoles, and tablets. Recommended internet speed: 5 Mbps for HD, 25 Mbps for 4K streaming.

questions.question: Why is my video buffering or quality poor?
questions.answer: Buffering typically indicates network issues. Recommendations: 1) Test internet speed (speedtest.net) 2) Restart modem/router 3) Lower stream quality in settings 4) Close bandwidth-intensive apps 5) Use wired connection if possible.

questions.question: How to download content for offline viewing
questions.answer: Look for the download icon (‚Üì) on supported titles. Downloads are available exclusively in the mobile app for offline viewing. Content expires after 48 hours due to licensing agreements and requires periodic reconnection.

questions.question: Fixing playback or audio issues
questions.answer: Troubleshooting steps: 1) Refresh the application 2) Verify audio output selection 3) Update browser/app to latest version 4) Clear cache and cookies 5) Test on alternative device/browser 6) Check for service status updates.

questions.question: App crashing or freezing
questions.answer: Resolution steps: 1) Update to latest app version 2) Force quit and restart app 3) Clear app cache/data 4) Reinstall application 5) Ensure sufficient device storage 6) Check device compatibility requirements.

questions.question: Website or app not loading properly
questions.answer: Diagnostic checklist: 1) Verify internet connectivity 2) Check browser compatibility 3) Disable browser extensions/ad-blockers 4) Clear browser cache 5) Test in incognito/private mode 6) Visit status.oliviuus.com for service updates.

questions.question: Clearing cache & cookies
questions.answer: Browser: Settings ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Clear Browsing Data. Mobile App: Device Settings ‚Üí Apps ‚Üí Oliviuus ‚Üí Storage ‚Üí Clear Cache. This resolves many loading issues while preserving your account data.

questions.question: Keeping your app updated
questions.answer: iOS: App Store ‚Üí Profile ‚Üí Available Updates. Android: Google Play Store ‚Üí My Apps ‚Üí Updates. Enable automatic updates for seamless access to new features, performance improvements, and security patches.

questions.question: Protecting your account security
questions.answer: Best practices: Use strong, unique passwords; enable two-factor authentication; never share login credentials; log out from shared devices; monitor account activity regularly; and be cautious of phishing attempts.

questions.question: How Oliviuus secures your data
questions.answer: We implement enterprise-grade security: end-to-end encryption, secure cloud infrastructure, regular security audits, GDPR/DPA compliance, and tokenized payment processing. Your payment details are never stored on our servers.

questions.question: Reporting security concerns
questions.answer: Immediately contact security@oliviuus.com with details of any suspicious activity. Include relevant timestamps, device information, and description. Our security team will investigate and assist with account protection.

questions.question: Privacy controls and data management
questions.answer: Access Account Settings to manage: viewing history, personalized recommendations, data sharing preferences, download permissions, and communication settings. You can also request data export or account deletion.

seo.title: Oliviuus Help Center | Customer Support & FAQs
seo.description: Get help with Oliviuus streaming service. Find answers to FAQs, troubleshooting guides, account support, payment help, and contact information. Available in English, French, and Kinyarwanda.
seo.keywords: Oliviuus help center, streaming support, account troubleshooting, payment help, technical support Rwanda, customer service, FAQ, contact Oliviuus
